question:
Which among the following have been covered under the National Initiative on Climate Resilient Agriculture?
1.Farm Crops
2.Livestock
3.Fisheries
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: National Initiative on Climate Resilient Agriculture (NICRA) was launched during February 2011 by Indian Council of Agricultural Research (lCAR) with the funding from Ministry of Agriculture, Government of India. Objective of this initiative is to enhance the resilience of Indian agriculture covering crops, livestock and fisheries to climatic variability and climate change through development and application of improved production and risk management technologies.
